name: H1Z1 Urbanator Loadout Pack
detailed_description:
Jump in H1Z1: Battle Royale in style with the Urbanator Loadout Pack!

This pack contains:
  • The Urbanator Loadout which includes beanie, shemagh, chest, gloves, armor, backpack, pants and shoes!
  • Bronze Riot Shotgun cosmetic skin
  • 5 Mayhem Crates
  • And a headstart to more great items with 5000 skulls to use in the in-game skull store!

    Your Urbanator cosmetic skins will appear in the Customize menu on the main screen. Your 5 Mayhem crates will appear in the Marketplace / My Crates menu.

Remember that H1Z1: Battle Royale is now Free to Play! Grab your friends and join the Mayhem!

short_description: Jump in H1Z1: Battle Royale in style with the Urbanator Loadout Pack!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 560 series or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
